name: Crazy Arrow: Shoot Spin Wheel
description:
Crazy Arrow is an addictive free tricky game.
Each of level in this game is unique, original and creative designed. You can enjoy yourself with your friends with this addictive and funny free game.

How fast can you Shoot the dots?

How many dots can you flash?

Can you finish the 1200 levels?


Come challenge yourself!


The game is a pure, minimal arcade game about risk, reflex and control.

Just click or tap the screen, shoot the small dots below one by one to the large rotating ball above, as long as all dots pin in the circle, you will pass smoothly!but pay attention to oh, small balls and small balls can never touch together!


Features:
- Up to 1200 levels designed to play.
- Play offline.
- Download this funny game For Free.
- Simple and highly addictive gameplay.
- Fun for All Ages: The best trivia game for family & friends’ gatherings!
- Great time killer.

If you like this game, welcome your suggestions for improvement.
